name: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR | 新次元ゲイム ネプテューヌＶⅡＲ | 新次元遊戲 戰機少女ＶⅡＲ
description: This enhanced version of 2016’s Megadimension Neptunia™ VII features smoother graphics courtesy of a new engine, a revamped battle system, and a whole new VR experience. Now, their dimensions and yours are connected!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or AMD A9 2.9 GHz equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with 1GB VRAM or more and compatibility with Direct X 11.0 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0 GHz equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space Sound Card: Direct Sound compatible sound card
